alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 28 at 2:01AM PDT until March 28 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT /11 PM PDT/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches in the valleys and 6 to 12 inches over the mountains, except lower amounts south of Burns to Juntura and in the Baker Valley. Areas of blowing and drifting snow with winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Harney County, Baker County and Malheur County zones. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT /11 PM PDT/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County
